title: Keep On Running
lyrics:
[Intro]
Something gon' get you
Something gon' grab you
Something gon' jump out of the bushes and grab you
Whole lotta folks, you better run faster
Something gon' grab you
Something gon' jump out of the bushes and grab you
Something gon' grab you
Oh, if you need this thing to grab you, yeah yeah...
[Chorus]
Keep on running
Keep on running from my love
Keep on running, yeah
Keep on running from my love
[Verse 1]
Some folks say that you're really, really fine
All you want to be is just a friend of mine
But I know – the man you're with's gonna break your heart
And you'll be sad real soon, yeah
[Chorus]
Keep on running
Keep on running from my love
Keep on running, yeah
Keep on running from my love

[Verse 2]
Some folks say that you're really, really fine
But all you want to be is just a friend of mine
But I know – I'm gonna get you away from him, real soon
[Chorus]
Why do you keep...
Keep on running, running from my love?
Yeah! Keep on running from...
Keep on running, running from my love
(I really need you, babe!)
Keep on running, running from my love
(In every way, yeah!)
Keep on running, running from my love
(Ooh, well, well, well, uh...)
Keep on running
Keep on running from my love (Well...)
Keep on running, yeah (Running, well, well...)
Keep on running from my love
[Verse 3]
Some folks say that your love is really good
All you want to be is just a friend of mine
But I know – I'm gonna get you in the end
'Cause I need you so

[Chorus]
Keep on running
Keep on running, running from my love
(Yeah! Keep on running, baby)
Keep on running, running from my love
(I don't believe you, hear me out! Say...)
Keep on running, running from my love
(Yeah! I–ahhhh....yeah!)
Keep on running, running from my love
(Sing it, girls, sing it loud!)
Keep on running, running from my love
(Ooh ohhhhh–ohhh yeah!)
Keep on running, running from my love
(Hooh! Runnin' that sugar sugar mouth...!)
Keep on running, running from my love
(Talkin' gonna get ya, yeah!)
Keep on running, running from my love
(You can be, babe – be my girl!)
Keep on running, running from my love
(Ohh, ohhh yeah... sing...)
Keep on running, running from my love
(Sing a little song for me...)
Keep on running, running from my love
(Sing... a song...)
Keep on running, running from my love
(Sing a little song for me)
Keep on running, running from my love
(Baby, you can bring it, love, love, love...)
Keep on running, running from my love
(Ohhh, go 'head and run...)
Keep on running, running from my love
(Baby, now, now, now, hey-ey!)
Keep on running, running from my love
(Ohhh, keep on, say it me with, yeah!)
Keep on running, running from my love
(Yeah!)
Keep on running, running from my love
(Something gon' jump out of the bushes and grab you! Ohhh... yeah!)
Keep on running, running from my love
(Keep on running – baby!)
Keep on running, running from my love
(Oh yeah yeah, yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah)
Keep on running, running from my love
(This is it... come get your's... yeah...)
Keep on running, running from my love
(Hey! Hey! Hey!)

[Bridge]
Hey! Hey! Hey!
Hey! Hey! Hey!
Hey! Hey! Hey!
Hey! Hey! Hey!
[Outro]
Keep on running!
Keep on running, running from my love
(Ohhhh, yeah, yeah yeah!)
Keep on running, running from my love
(I'm getting tired of you running! Ohh)
Keep on running, running from my love
(Can you feel it, lil' suga, yeah? Yeah!)
Keep on running, running from my love
(Yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah....)
Keep on running, running from my love
(He–hey!)
Keep on running, running from my love
(Baby baby baby baby baby baby, mama mama mama...)
Keep on running, running from my love
